Couchdbtools::Config¶

You can define a configuration file in the YAML format. It is expeted in the root directory of your application. The content should look something like this:

# -*- encoding : utf-8 -*-
#
# configuration file for couchdbtools
#
app:
  logfile: './couchdbtools.log'

db:
  host: 'localhost'
  name: 'kassenbuch'
  port: '5984'
  protocol: 'http'
